column4: Um I need help partitioning a windows Hd into a linux HD, I am on disk manager & it doesnt let me click delete or create...
I am logged in btw
How do  ipartition thsi windows HD?
Ello, anyone there?
partitioning a previous partition
editing
I am in the disk options under administration
the delet & create buttons are not lit up
I have 2 partitions, I want too repartition entire HD so I can make it a linux HD
rather ^
an IDE hard drive?
is the other one on the same cable set to cable select too?
rather
if the bios was fine then linux will be with it
do fdisk -l and see what shows up
mkfs -t ext3
or mkfs.ext3 /dev/device#partition
do fdisk -l as sudo and paste the contents to me in a PM.  only paste the contents having to do with that device
I said paste it in a PM to me, not in the channel
www.pastebin.com
what makes you think it is your cdrom?
